body_html:
Nice catch!
The problem is that it's only tested whether the concatenation axis is too large (>= ndims) here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/array_ops.py#L530
This also needs to test for concat_dim < 0.
body_text:
Nice catch!
The problem is that it's only tested whether the concatenation axis is too large (>= ndims) here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/array_ops.py#L530
This also needs to test for concat_dim < 0.
body:
Nice catch!
The problem is that it's only tested whether the concatenation axis is too large (`>= ndims`) here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/array_ops.py#L530
This also needs to test for `concat_dim < 0`.
